title: Husbands Who Agree to Become Dads Via Donated Sperm Legally Bound, Court Rules
text:
As long as married couples agree on the procedure in advance, a baby conceived using sperm from a donor is legally their child.

The Supreme Court on Wednesday rejected an appeal brought by a man who refuses to acknowledge a child born to his wife but conceived using the sperm of a donor as his own.

The court ruled that a husband who agrees in advance to be the father of a child conceived through artificial insemination using another person's sperm cannot change his mind regarding his parental status after the child is born.
